description: This file defines a set of classes, functions, and objects related to managing a shopping list, meal planning, and team coordination within a software project. It includes definitions for agents, teams, tools, and session state management, specifically for a shopping list and recipe suggestion system.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent with specific tools and instructions for managing tasks.

classes.name: Team
classes.description: Represents a team of agents or subteams coordinating on tasks such as shopping list management and meal planning.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the shopping list managed by an agent.

methods.name: remove_item
methods.description: Removes an item from the shopping list managed by an agent.

methods.name: remove_all_items
methods.description: Clears all items from the shopping list.

methods.name: get_ingredients
methods.description: Retrieves current shopping list ingredients for recipe suggestions.

methods.name: list_items
methods.description: Lists all items currently in the shopping list.

methods.name: add_chore
methods.description: Adds a chore with a specified priority to the team session state.
